Package goal.tools.unittest.testsection.testconditions

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Always
    Always operator for LTL queries in EvaluateIn.
    AtEnd
    AtEnd operator for LTL queries in EvaluateIn.
    AtStart
    AtStart operator for LTL queries in EvaluateIn.
    Eventually
    Eventually operator for LTL queries in EvaluateIn.
    Never
    Never operator for LTL queries in EvaluateIn.
    TestCondition
    Abstract base for any test condition.
    TestConditionEvaluator
    Base to evaluate TestConditions in the context of a running agent.
    Until
    Until operator.
    While
    While operator.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    TestConditionEvaluator.TestConditionEvaluation
    A test condition can have one out of three evaluations: TestConditionEvaluator.TestConditionEvaluation.PASSED, TestConditionEvaluator.TestConditionEvaluation.FAILED, or TestConditionEvaluator.TestConditionEvaluation.UNKNOWN.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    TestBoundaryException
    Exception thrown when a boundary is reached.
    TestConditionFailedException
    Exception thrown when the TestCondition fails.
